title: A few very difficult T210 Series 7 cards available.....prices lowered!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: A few very difficult T210 Series 7 cards available.....prices lowered!
posts.post_content:
I have some of the toughest cards in the 7th Series t210 set available for sale below.  All are very difficult although Hyames is debatable.  Most of these represent the only example to be graded by ANY company.  Prices include shipping and scans are available upon request.  

Thanks in advance,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

t210 Series 7 Ham SGC 20 - The ONLY example that has been slabbed by PSA, SGC, etc.. -- $135 [SOLD]
t210 Series 7 Hyames  SGC 30 (no creases) -- $265 
t210 Series 7 Irving SGC AUT - The ONLY example that has been slabbed by PSA, SGC, etc.. -- $110 [SOLD]
t210 Series 7 Gunderson SGC 10 - The ONLY example to be graded by SGC -- $85

Just a few t210-7s left....cards listed above are now all that's available. Thanks in advance!

Brian

Bump...down to two Series 7s left, Hyames and Gunderson.  Thanks guys,
Brian
